subject: controlled evps session
author: hjkrol59
full_text:
did a controlled evp session at old house and got intelligent responses. one even callled me by my name. when we went to leaveone said come back. we asked if a professor was there he said i am here. we asked if the greek man was there he said something i dont uinderstand.  was way cool!

Holly McGee 
 Director: Columbia Paranormal and
